metadata.title: GIFR MOVERS LED Backpack, Full Color Screen Programmable Screen Waterproof Backpack, Men And Women Travel Laptop Backpack
features: 【Materials and Applicable Scenes】This LED backpack is made of waterproof oxford cloth, built-in 64*64 full color dot matrix waterproof screen. It is a programmable tech backpack for portable billboards, ads, holiday wishes, slogans and business promotions. Suitable for commuting, travel, cycling, outdoor adventure, work, school bag, hiking backpack, or even a surprise gift for friends.

【how to use】: Download the led space app from the app store or download LOY PLAY. Use the built-in USB port (inside the backpack) to connect the power pack. After the Bluetooth device is successfully connected, open the LED space application. You can add subtitles, animated GIFs and images and display them on the LED screen. The backpack is compatible with any power bank with output above 2A. A 10,000mAh power bank can last 6 hours for the backpack.

【Colorful text graffiti】In the APP, you can enter text or upload your favorite pattern and create your own style of DIY graffiti, such creativity is too cool!Languages supported by app: English, French, Spanish, simplified Chinese, traditional Chinese, Japanese, German, Portuguese, Russian

【Space Capacity】It can hold (17L capacity) , which is convenient for things like water bottles, books, documents, wallets, pens, cell phones, tablets, mobile power, 15.6-inch laptops, etc. to meet the needs of daily work and study and travel.
【Customer Service】Don't worry about after-sales service, if you have any questions or need technical support, please feel free to contact us.
description: Text language supported by the App: English, French, Spanish, Simplified Chinese,Traditional Chinese, Italian, Latin, Japanese, German, Portuguese,Russian.
